MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD15 area of Berwick Upon Tweed, affecting properties in Castle Hills House and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:30am due to a leaning pole and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 8:45 AM on Monday, 15 February 2021.
